createWalletNote: By creating the wallet, you need to write down your seed phrase and store it securely so that your wallet can be recovered in the case your device was lost or stolen
seedphraseNote: Do not let anyone see your seed phrase.
seedphraseManagerNote: Never type your seed phrase into password managers or elsewhere.
copyphraseNote: Make at least 2 copies of the phrase in case of emergency.
backupPrompt: Your seed phrase is the access key to all the funds in your wallet. Print or write down the phrase to keep it in a safe or in a locked vault. Without the phrase, you will not be able to recover your funds.
saveSeedphraseContent: Please write the seed phrase down. Do not screenshot it and save it in your photo gallery. It makes the phrase prone to cyber attacks and, less secure.
confirmSeedphrasePrompt: To ensure the seed phrase is written down correctly, please fill in the specific words below.
setpasswordForWallet: Create password to access your wallet
enterYourPassword: Enter your password to access the wallet
enterOrScan: Input recipient's ID or http address
boxAutoIdentify: Put the QR code into the box and automatically identify it
usecreatedPhrasePrompt: This is a 24 word phrase you were given when you created your previous wallet.
passwordIncorrect: The password you have entered is incorrect.
twoinputsNotSame: The two inputs are inconsistent, please re-enter
createNewPass: Create password to access your wallet
senderMsgNoti: The transaction you sent has been signed, and is waiting for your signature and confirmation
receiverMsgNoti: A new transaction is waiting for your signature.
MJRefreshAutoFooterIdleText: Tap or pull up to load more
wordInconsistent: The words are inconsistent with the seed phrase. Please try again.
setStrongPasswordPrompt: You are highly recommended to set a strong password, preferably with uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
waitingSenderSign: TX Status: waiting for the sender to sign
waitingOwnerSign: TX Status: waiting for your signature
waitingRecipientSign: TX Status: waiting for recipient to sign
successfulSignature: Signature completed. Waiting for the sender to process.
mnemonicChangeedBackup: Seed phrase has been changed because of screenshot. Please back up new seed phrase
recovering: Restoring wallet...Please do not close wallet.
openAlbumInfo: The album failed to open. The device does not support access to the album, please set it in Settings -> Privacy -> Photos
retunrnMsg: If you return to seed phrase,it would be changed and your local password won't be saved.
sendSelfWarning: Please don't send VCash to your own wallet address
matchWords: Match the words to their due sequences
confirmBackMsg: Your current seed will become obsolete and the new seed will be generated.
recoverWalletWarning: Your current wallet will be logged out if you restore other wallets. Please ensure seed phrase has been correctly saved before taking actions.
checkSeedPhrase: Failed to create wallet, please check the information you filled out Is the seed phrase correct?
insufficientFundsWaring: Insufficient funds. You are trying to send more funds (%@ VCash) than available (%@ VCash).
sendVCashPrompt: Sending VCash is an interactive process that the sender and the recipient need to interact back and forth to ensure the transaction is implemented.
receiveTransactionFilePrompt: VCash can be received through transaction files. Copy the transaction file you got into the following form and continue.
signTransactionFilePrompt: Copy the signed transaction file and send it to the sender
